name: Dim Hop
description:
A short game. It's not even a game! i didn't have time to finish it.

Me and my friend pepeulous was going to enter our first game jam and game in unity but we didn't have time to finish it so i made this game in godot in about 2 hours.

I didn't have time to submit but this was for the gmtk game jam

This game was made in Godot
